Blacknightmare::

"No this time"replied Blacknighmare"A bot like this alive=
 is wortiest than died"

Blacknightmare took the robot and dragged her towa=
rds cr where Blacknightmare left her. The Predacon closed cr's door and whi=
le the cr repaired the intruder the same cr, erased every previuos memory a=
nd reprogramed the bot. Every memory, was downloaded to Darkfate private fi=
les, where nobody over Darkfate could read them. 
  ----- Original Message =

  From: CYBERWOLF4

 May 23, 2001 9:23 AM
  Subject: Re: Happanings at BlackFortress


  OOC- R=
emember, it was me that mentioned something about a bit of overkill.


  Bl=
ast after blast of energy struck the mutant hawk. Her blood already
  stain=
ed the floor of the Black Fortress. Blacknightmare was obviously a bot
  wh=
o didn't take chances. Either that or the Predacon just loved to shoot her
=
  stungun. Silver Scout fainted out of  consciousness, her vitals were slow=
ing
  as she lay in a lump on the floor. Shr had challenged her foe and los=
t. If
  she didn't recieve help she'd soon die.

  Blaze and Bullet stood o=
ver the still bot stareing at the bot. Bullet kicked
  it viciously to make=
 sure it wasn't acting. "We got it boss." he said
  turning to Blacknightma=
re.

  Blaze licked her lips at the sight of the downed hawk, "Can we eat i=
t?" she
  asked hopeing for a good organic meal. The energeon rations that =
she'd been
  eating were adaquate for survival but tasted like battery acid=
 compared to a
  good organic meal. She transformed to tiger and started sn=
iffing Silver
  Scout. "She's still alive." she stated in disapointment. "C=
an I kill it?"
  she asked, as she took a lick of  the mutants energeon fro=
m the floor.

ject: Re: Happanings at BlackFortress
